entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light before morning. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. Snow beginning late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow in open areas late in the evening and overnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 1 April 2023
